product_name: Julbo Alagna Lifestyle Sunglasses - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Gracefully combining vision technology and beauty, these feminine frames wrap smaller faces with premium polycarbonate lenses and a curved design that won't interfere with glammed-up eyelashes.
